WRITING.TITLE: This open source app allows you to control physical objects around you with Arduino and Android.
WRITING.TEXT: Link for the app: http://bit.ly/1wjijh6 Link for the source code: http://bit.ly/1FgwuNF

WRITING.TITLE: What is the cheapest BLE module to use with Arduino based product?

WRITING.TEXT: I'm building a product based on the Raspberry Pi as the control unit, but I want to modify on the design by removing some components to make it cheaper. Thanks for the link!

WRITING.TITLE: Where can I find the BOM of Raspberry Pi B+ ?

WRITING.TEXT: It's ideal for rapid prototyping, I'm posting on twitter with only 1 line of code from Arduino, used before in our booth during a big event and the output was amazing.

WRITING.TITLE: Makeuseof is giving a free 1Sheeld for Christmas.

WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys, Amr here from the makers of 1Sheeld, you can chec out a lot of examples by the community on Hackster.io/1Sheeld
Also you can check out some [projects on instructables](http://www.instructables.com/howto/1sheeld/) and let me know if you need anything :)
That's awesome, would you share an instructable after you finish? :)
Okay, what are the cheapest components to assemble it? do you have a good tutorial?

WRITING.TITLE: What is the cheapest Humanoid out there to buy? I'm talking laser cut or Balsa wood chassis even.
Wanted to share this here, I got 20% off 1Sheeld on Amazon.

WRITING.TEXT: no i don't think it will be relevant to children, especially with the gun part!
